body:
geant4 depends on `glu`, not just `gl`, when using variant `+opengl`.

Relevant excerpt of `config/sys/Linux-g++.gmk` in geant4@10.6.2
```cmake
  ifndef OGLLIBS
    OGLLIBS   := -L$(OGLHOME)/lib$(ARCH) -lGLU -lGL
  endif
```

Maintainer tag: @drbenmorgan
